1.0.name: wordpress/textbroker-enhance
1.0.description:
It adds filters to the modified Textbroker wordpress plugin (http://akmdrei.github.com/Textbroker-Wordpress-Plugin-Plus/).

Note that the normal plugin from Textbroker does not support hooks, so you first need to install the modified version.

These filters are:

  1. Enhance all SEO-Keywords from Textbroker with the HTML bold tag

  2. If you are using the All-In-One-SEO-Pack http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/all-in-one-seo-pack/ all SEO-Keywords from Textbroker will automatically be added to the HTML-Keywords field of All-In-One-SEO-Pack

This plugin is Multi-Site compatible!
